title: Spinal Tap Case 1
decription: Convert a string to spinal case. Spinal case is all-lowercase-words-joined-by-dashes. 1

title: Spinal Tap Case 2
decription: function spinalCase(str) { return str.replace (/([a-z])([A-Z])/g, '$1 $2').replace (/[_\s]/g, '-').toLowerCase(); } spinalCase('This Is Spinal Tap'); } spinalCase('This Is Spinal Tap');

title: Spinal Tap Case 3
decription: Convert a string to spinal case. Spinal case is all-lowercase-words-joined-by-dashes. 3
